name: Livdin
description: Livdin is a web application that lets users post reviews on previous and current places of residence. The application was designed with the idea of giving individuals a space to review their current place of residence free from the real estate pressure.

name: 3D Printing Quiz
description: Did you even Want to test your 3D printing knowledge? On a nice easy to use UI? Now heres your chance! I created this app with the maker in mind. Making the questions challengeing but doable.

name: Date Night Recipes
description: Have you ever been preparing for a date, deciding to stay in or go out. But terrified of what you'll make if you stay in? Well look no further. Date Night Recipes can provide you with gormet meals and cocktail recipes all in one place. Giving you the best date experice that you have ever had!

name: Password Generator
description: Security is a big deal now a days. No one is safe. But some are safer than others. With this password generator you too can be one of the safe ones. With the ability to choose the length, and type of characters. You will be the safest on the internet!

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Weather Dashboard is a nice and simple way to view the weather without all the noise from ads and other features that you just don't care about. No more wondering if your looking at the correct forcast in your area!
